creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com
text: While using a jsp with a request time expression , a whitespace is introduced . The follwoing code : <%=pageContext.getAttribute("Dept")%> is displayed as: Quality where quality is the value of the expression.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Fixed. That was a showstopper that we fixed today (it was breaking a few tests 
in the J2EE RI).
